page.title: 01Bennachie and Tilliefoure.
page.content: This area lies to the south of Bennachie, includes a stretch of the river Don and Milstone Hill. It is approximately 20miles to the NE of Aberdeen between Monymusk and Keig. An area of much natural beauty with a picturesque drive beside the river through the Lords Throat to Keig,there are points along the river for fishing and,in the shallower reaches, bathing. Much of the area is forest owned by the Forestry Commission who have provided a car park and Information centre with access to a number of walks. There are crofts, farms and traditional dwellings along the roadside sheltered by the hills from the north winds. The lowland is either pasture or cultivated for silage to feed the animals in winter.
